pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ta-sites[![pip version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/ta-sites.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/ta-sites)Thoughtful Automation sites package. This package contains the function required for Thoughtful Automation bots. Documentation may be closed and certain functions may not work outside the Thoughtful Automation environment.Example Usage-------------
